Put Dune (1992) SCDB Mix (AdLib + MT-32 + AdLib Gold) soundtrack here.

Download from:
https://www.moddb.com/downloads/dune-soundtrack-3-card-scdb-mix
or
https://forum.dune2k.com/files/file/1518-3-card-mix-of-cryos-dune-soundtrack/

Make sure, file-names are exactly as listed below.

List of files:

01 - Arrakis (Dune Theme).flac
02 - Morning (Chani's Eyes).flac
03 - Bagdad (Free Men).flac
04 - Sequence (Wake Up).flac
05 - Worm Intro (Sign of the Worm).flac
06 - Worm Suit (Spice Opera).flac
07 - Sietch.flac
08 - War Song (Too).flac
09 - Water (Water).flac
